name: Easy IPChange
short_description:
Are you tired of manually changing your IP Address?  All that left clicking then right clicking through menu's - don't get me started on the tabbing too...well I am tired of it!  
That's why I developed Easy IPChange a light, fast and easy to use script to quickly change the IP address of any network adapter.

Easy IPChange can be launched directly and used with a nice batch GUI or even automated with CLI arguments!  Sweet! 

IP change has been developed as a batch script (.bat) designed for the XP command interpreter however is forwards compatible with any current windows OS (Win7 & 8 may need to 'run as admin').

Changing your IP Addy is as easy as:
IPCHANGE /IP 192.168.0.2 /MASK 255.255.255.224 /DG 192.168.0.1

IPCHANGE /DHCP

Easy IPChange is the best free IP Changing script out there so check it out!  If you don't like it - tell me about it...and if you do - Win Win!

Check out the Youtube vid
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nfee-10CaJk&list=UUq-H3HcL6KzIx2R7ApsNGrA
summary: Quick and easy command line tool for changing an IP address
